name: Patchwork Kingdom #155 | Nilfroros
description: The twin kingdoms of Nilfroros, separated by a digital divide. A bustling kingdom of 108 schools on top that are all connected to the internet, and 60 schools, not connected, hidden in the upside down kingdom | Created for Giga (GigaConnect.org) — connecting every school in the world — in celebration of UNICEF's 75th birthday, by Nadieh Bremer
